# Nested for loops? {-}

We want to loop through not just the week, but also the year. We can apply our same knowledge as before: 
```{r, echo = F, warning = F, message = F}
library(lubridate)
process_patents <- function(filepath){
    df <- read.csv(filepath)
    df$App_Date <- ymd(as.character(df$App_Date))
    df$Issue_Date <- ymd(as.character(df$Issue_Date))
    return(df)
}
```

```{r, warning = F, message = F}
patents <- data.frame()
for(i in 1977:1978){
  for(j in 1:52){
    df <- process_patents(paste0("~/Box/d-rug/data/uspto_",i, "_", j, ".csv"))
    patents <- rbind(patents, df)
  }
}
```
